title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: The layout is getting corrupted when deleting items from the Coolbar. This bug was observed in Build 2002071610021.
OB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. Following this deletion, the Launch item is moved to the first row instead of staying on the second row.
EB: The Launch item should remain on the second row after deleting an item from the Coolbar.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application with the Coolbar. 
2. Navigate to the second row of the Coolbar. 
3. Press the Delete button to delete an item from the second row. 
4. Observe that the Launch item is moved to the first row instead of staying on the second row.
